concept.title: Using the command bar
concept.shortdesc: The command bar is a dockable window in which you type ZWCAD commands and view prompts and other program messages. To display the command bar, choose Tools > Command Line. You can move the command bar by way of dragging.

conbody.p: When the command bar is floating, you can drag the top or bottomof the window to change the number of lines of text it displays. You can dock the command bar at the top or bottomof the drawing.
